Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron 13z i13Z-3636sLV
Reviews.Author: Edmoun
Reviews.Content: excellent performance, i am using it more than a month , every day i like it more,fast start fast to shutdown,very good for entertainment. the only complain i haveis that the battery con not be replaced. i would recomend it for friendes, i just got one formy dauter.

Reviews.Title: Nice basic laptop
Reviews.Author: mwk
Reviews.Content: Nice basic laptop, not the fastest but good enough for the traveler that just needs the basic computer to check email and do some web surfing.

Reviews.Title: decent
Reviews.Author: eg
Reviews.Content: Ive had this computer for about a month. I'm a high school student and I mostly use it for editing papers and surfing the web, so it serves its purpose. The size is great-small and light enough to easily carry around, while still big enough to have a good-sized screen. However, there is a rather thick plastic border around the screen, which is unfortunate as you lose about an inch of the screen.This computer comes with A LOT of bloatware-enough to slow it down considerably. If you can, reload windows as soon as you get it. This computer does not have a cd reader, so this may be difficult if you do not have an adapter.A problem Im having with this computer is that there are covers on the ports, and they are badly made. It is difficult to open them and they get in the way of my wires. They also look as though they'll crack off within a few months, if that.Also, this computer gets VERY hot, very fast. If you do buy this, keep in mind that you'll almost definitely have to get a cooling fan, as it gets extremely hot.The design is ok-not the best quality (mostly plastic) but ok. The cover can be switched for a different design or color. The screen resolution is not the greatest- it is average at best.I like this computer because it works pretty fast-6 GB RAM is unusual in a computer in this price range.All in all, this computer is ok. It was a good purchase for $350.00, although Im not sure what its going for now. If its being sold in the 500 dollar range, I would recommend doing research on other computers, as you can find better ones for the price. For the $350 range, this is probably the best thing youll find.

Reviews.Title: bad experience, good performance
Reviews.Author: Ilkan A.
Reviews.Content: First of all, I have used a lot of laptops professionally, dissassembled many laptops so many times.Fujitsu siemensAsus A6jcAsus G73jh A2Dell Latýtude E6410Packard bell NAV05Acer 54seriesThese are my previous and current laptops. But only this one has stupidly placed hardwares and cheap palmrest (case) whose nails were broken in the first hdd replacement trial. Then while right corner nail which hold keybord was also damaged and keyboard is making noise during pressing top right corner letters.If you want to buy this and just use. Do not dissassemble to replace RAM or any of the hardwares, especially harddisk.This is my dissapointment.When you look at the performance, laptop is doing good job with W8 and 128 V300 SSD (yes, I broke the nails but managed to swap to SSD). Startup is around 6-8 seconds.WEICPU - 6.5RAM - 7.2VGA1 - 5.1VGA2 - 6.3HDD - 7.9If I don't destroy laptop physically, I am planning to use it for a long time due to its performance.Edit: Additions- Battery life seems good. Wifi is on, brightness is @max and couple of episodes are downloaded and watched during cycle. It lasts around 5 hours.- It comes with 1 month McAfee and Office 365 subscription.- CPU fan isn't starting working till CPU is overloaded since CPU is consuming only 17watts. Therefore it is very quite. Even the fan is working, it is working slower than usual.- I didn't see any heat issue. Only the section where fan sits is heating slightly but it is difficult to feel from keyboard.For these positive reasons, I have changed rate to 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Dell Inspiron 13z What I expected!!!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Garcia
Reviews.Content: August 08, 2013Dell Inspiron 13z (Computer model: Inspiron 5323)July 15, 2013HARDWAREIn this range price: unbeatable. It is what I expected.OSIf you don't like Win 8, create a logical partition to install Win 7 in a dual boot setup. Just look for how to prepare a UEFI Boot USB.EXTRASDo you need VGA Output? I bought this adapter, but amazon warehouse shipped to me one not active, but it works:Cable Matters Active HDMI to VGA M/F Adapter w/ 3 FT Micro USB Charging Cable in BlackB00879DM56What about case? I bought this one:Caselogic PAS-213 13-Inch Macbook Neoprene Sleeve (Black)B002W5V8SE

Reviews.Title: Great deal.  Good build quality.
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: I bought this for $400.  I don't think you can probably do much better than this for the price.  It's very light and has pretty solid build quality.  Very thin.I'm an IT guy and I often carry this instead of my work laptop on trips because its lighter and boots nearly instantly when an additional mSATA card, which isn't included, is installed in the mSATA slot and Windows is installed directly to it.  I highly recommend techies adding an mSATA card as it will make this perform like a $700+ laptop.

Reviews.Title: Really good
Reviews.Author: Pipe
Reviews.Content: I bought this product a couple of days ago and its quite good. Its a shame it doesn't have CD reader, that's it :)

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Fred
Reviews.Content: Lovely laptop, very light and easy to carry around. am yet to see an pad as efficient as any laptop in the market.

Reviews.Title: good buy
Reviews.Author: Georgia
Reviews.Content: my 16 year old is pleased. successfully does all it needs to. perfect for a student. a very good buy

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Antony Parreno
Reviews.Content: Awesome product, sleek and easy to use.Didnt like the cover of the ports though, but overall, awesome!Cheap as well!

Reviews.Title: Very good and fair deal
Reviews.Author: Nima
Reviews.Content: This lap top is really good and I strongly recommend it. Now, I have it for about 6 months and still did not get any problem with it. The key board keys are not great but not worse than similar options. The price is so good and fair. It is a little bit heavy. The body is plastic made but it is fine. The area around the CPU becomes hot but this is also common for any new laptops. In general very good deal for the price.

Reviews.Title: Very nice. Convenient size for traveling.
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: Nice laptop. Took it on a European vacation/cruise. We watched movies and communicated with friends and relatives whenever we found a free WiFi cafe, e.g Spain, Turkey. I was able to keep a short blog, as well. I would like to upgrade to an I7 CPU, one day.While in Europe, I needed a different connector but did not need a transformer since the transformer that comes with the laptop was compatible with European current requirements.

Reviews.Title: Very enjoyable!
Reviews.Author: Andrew Boedecker
Reviews.Content: This computer has been exactly what I hoped for, with a pleasant surprise as to how quiet and relatively cool it runs.  I would strongly recommend it to anyone looking for a dependable computer without spending too much money on it.

Reviews.Title: it's light and can do all the work.
Reviews.Author: Augustine Muguy
Reviews.Content: Dell Inspiron 13z i13Z-3636sLV 13.3-Inch Laptop (Moon Silver) is the best. it's easy to carry around because it's light weight and I love Window 8. The best!!

Reviews.Title: Value for money
Reviews.Author: Nafis ansari
Reviews.Content: Stylish, portable , good sound quality...It's good for students who require a laptop for browsing net and also want to use some simple software a for there course work....

Reviews.Title: I wish it was Windows 7!
Reviews.Author: Patty
Reviews.Content: I thought I could deal with Windows 8, I guess not. Nope, I still have to go back to the desktop. One thing I don't like this computer is that the outlet of all sorts of device are covered by little lids that they can easily broken off. I broke one the first 10 minutes when I receive this laptop. However, it's fast, that I can tolerate the other little things. For the price I paid for, it's a really good deal!

Reviews.Title: Good for students
Reviews.Author: sidhartha
Reviews.Content: well this laptop is very light to carry if you are a student and you have to walk to college this is the best choice and performance is good for the price :)

Reviews.Title: Computer good, Windows 8 thumbs down.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "jvr"
Reviews.Content: So far I'm very pleased with this laptop, but like so many other folks have mentioned about Windows 8, it sucks but I will have to learn to live with it.

Reviews.Title: Useful
Reviews.Author: Keith Suarez
Reviews.Content: Great product. Very light and easy to carry. Has windows 8 which is very fun to explore. I enjoy it

Reviews.Title: Sleek, Fast shipping
Reviews.Author: FamilyGuy
Reviews.Content: I had to order the laptop for my father-in-law who was going on a trip abroad. The laptop arrived quickly, it was light weight and sleek.

Reviews.Title: bad experience
Reviews.Author: Mracia Yolanda Martinez Tintin
Reviews.Content: fue una pésima experiencia ya que el la computadora que me enviaron estaba defectuosa, al momento de usarla por primera vez duro encendida 5 minutos y se apagó sin motivo alguno. Tuve que llevarla donde un técnico para que la revisara y el me indicó que la computadora estaba defectuosa. Me parece terriblewas a terrible experience because the computer they sent me was faulty, upon first use hard on for 5 minutes and off without reason. I had to take where a technician to review it and told me that the computer was faulty. I am appalled

Reviews.Title: some system problem
Reviews.Author: Zhu Lianjun
Reviews.Content: I just bought the laptop. It looks good. However, there is always some system problem. Such as the host processor for windows tasks has stopped working. And the internet explorer stopped suddenly. I asked the customer service. They only told me to restart the laptop. How was that?!

Reviews.Title: It died after a week
Reviews.Author: Myron A. Hyman
Reviews.Content: Had to return it - it died - send replacement drive - still dead...People were great at Dell in Phillipines - offered upgrade - still waiting nowwant me to accept warranty from original purchase date!!!!To be continued

Reviews.Title: Bad experience
Reviews.Author: JasminJ
Reviews.Content: My old laptop broke several weeks ago so I bought this one. When I found the wifi connection of the new laptop did not work well I asked several friends to check whether it was because the setting was not appropriate but we did not figure out the reason. Then I called Dell technical support and spent an hour on the phone call but finally did not figure it out again so I decided to return the laptop as anyone will do. After about one week, the seller said they tested the laptop and it worked well and they will deduct 15% of my refund. I sent several emails trying to explain the problem I met but that did not change anything.So my experience with this laptop is I expected it help me with my work but it did not do anything for me, I had to contact with different people trying to solve the problem within those weeks and finally I returned the laptop and lost 60 dollars. What makes me feel really bad is it wasted me A LOT OF TIME. I WAS BUSY WITH MY WORK.The laptop looks good but the caps over USB port are annoying.

Reviews.Title: The model i13Z-3636sLV managed under another name on Dell website
Reviews.Author: Nobouki
Reviews.Content: Previously, I posted "The model i13Z-3636sLV doesn't exist according to Dell website" based on the following page: [...] where it is stated:"Dell Inspiron 13Z-3636sLV" is not a Dell model number. This number is provided by the system resellers".Thanks to Mr Garcia for having replied that the i13Z-3636sLV and the Inspiron 5323 would be the same model.I'm still puzzled. Why would/does Dell sell this model under 2 different codes in the US market ? Doesn't that complicate the search for driver updates or the replacement of components ?I'll keep my rating at 3 stars till I receive my order and have the opportunity to test this model by myself.

Reviews.Title: bad quality
Reviews.Author: vlisdero
Reviews.Content: The openings at the side are dreadful. Once opened it, s almost impossible to, put them back in place. I expected something lighter cause it weighs like hell. The samsung operating system is sooooo much better than this one.

Reviews.Title: Poor sound occurred. With hard disc
Reviews.Author: Ruiying W.
Reviews.Content: The hard disk have strange sound when I first open it.Poor lucky myself. I need to buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Wasting time
Reviews.Author: Martha diko
Reviews.Content: I bought dell inspiron13z i13Z-3636sLV 13.3inch laptop fron amazon.com. when the first time I saw the laptop it looks pretty and great size; however, the laptop didn't have the hard drive or DVD player .Then I decided to return within two days because the laptop is noot good for educational purpose and I am doubt about its durablity either .I decided not to buy electronics from amazon or any online store.

Reviews.Title: HATE WINDOWS 8
Reviews.Author: Bonnie M. Way
Reviews.Content: It always takes too many steps to get what I want,  Can't find or make favorites! I love the size but that is all.  Windows *8 is a nightmare.  Bonnie

3rd Generation Intel Core i3-3227U Processor (3M Cache, 1.9 GHz)
6 GB DDR3 RAM
500 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
13.3-Inch HD (720p) widescreen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 13z i13Z-3636sLV 13.3-Inch Laptop (Moon Silver)
